title: Effective Mathematics Instructional Design Strategies in Remote Education Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Modular mathematics education design for working professionals with time constraints in smartphone-based learning environments.

learning_goals: Learners can apply core linear algebra concepts with over 80% accuracy through 15-minute microlearning modules in a mobile environment
Learners can explain mathematical problem-solving procedures through asynchronous media-based interactive activities (quizzes, video lectures, simulations)
Learners can achieve a score of 70 or higher on comprehensive assessments using a mobile-optimized evaluation system even in limited technological environments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
